## Research

```{r ExperienceResearch, echo=FALSE}
clean_string <- function(x) {
  x <- gsub("\\\\.*\\}\\{", '', x)
  gsub("\\}\\}", '', x)
}

data <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DominiqueMakowski/CV/main/data/experience_research.csv", fileEncoding= "UTF-8")
data$Activity <- clean_string(data$Activity)
knitr::kable(data)
```
